Name: Elder Aviator
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A floral riff on the classic Aviation .
History: Created in 2006 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Elder Aviator contains 201 calories
